data.message: Facebook you need to answer for substantial investments made by Russian surrogates of Putin through Kushner & what that says about your failure to monitor ads and how may ads were on Facebook and how much you made off it (Twitter also) You both are complicit with Russia and your foot dragging to come to Congress Zuckerburg your Russian investors speak volumes as to why you haven't shown up

replies.message:
Yeah, FB!  And you are all at Facebook indiscriminately wrongfully branding as "spam" ANY CONTENT or any article--even cat photos, on my Timeline, and no matter what I do, you have singled me out, and launched on a campaign to make my Facebook experience unusable and CENSORED by using the pretext of SPAM as a way to cowardly silence my voice and the rights you have preserved for others to enjoy.  And after I post ANY THING, you AUTOMATICALLY have your bots and algorithms send me this instantaneous piece of boilerplate claiming: "We're reviewing this post against our Community Standards.
lock
